tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_ad_metrics (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Social_Media_Ad_Performance (
 ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ad_name TEXT,
 ad_type TEXT,
 impressions INT,
 clicks INT,
 conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_ad_performance_metrics (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ads_performance_metrics (
    ad_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id UUID,
    ad_name VARCHAR(255),
    impressions INTEGER,
    clicks INTEGER,
    conversions INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget NUMERIC,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance_history (
    history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    impressions INTEGER,
    clicks INTEGER,
    conversions INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  account_id INT REFERENCES ad_accounts(account_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT REFERENCES ad_campaigns(campaign_id),
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  impressions INT NOT NULL,
  clicks INT NOT NULL,
  conversions INT NOT NULL,
  spend DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_targeting (
  targeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_id INT REFERENCES ad_performance_metrics(metric_id),
  region_id INT REFERENCES ad_regions(region_id),
  age_range VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  interests VARCHAR(255)
);
